title: Kin no Hitsuji
sinopse:
Tsugu is separated from her friends (Sora, Yuushin and Asari) when she moves away. After a few years, she finally returns and is happy to be reunited with them. Tsugu believes that her friends didn't change, but that doesn't turn out to be the case.

(Source: MU)

Included one-shot:
Volume 3: Love Letter
